GSD.description:
ext4: fix null-ptr-deref in ext4_write_info

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.331 by commit dc451578446afd03c0c21913993c08898a691435. For more details please see the references link.
